group_1.textLeft: I want to continue exchanging letters.

group_1.textRight: Eh...? B-but...

group_1.textLeft: It's hard to send my feelings to@someone...
And I know that it may hurt the other@person...
And even if leaving behind my feelings@is a weakness...
It keeps me tied to reality...@That's how I feel.

group_1.textRight: ...To connect yourself to someone's hope,@desperately trying to survive...

group_1.textLeft: Right...
Meru and Kanae both entrusted me with@their feelings...
So Mifuyu,@please believe in me and my feelings...
It may be a weakness, but it is also my hope.
For me, it's a power that helps me live...
So please.@Continue exchanging letters with me.

group_1.textRight: Even if it's a weakness...@It's okay, right...?
It's okay for me to rely on Yacchan...@Right...?

group_1.textLeft: After all this time,@you're is still a crybaby, Mifuyu.

group_1.textRight: Uuu....
...Thank you, Yacchan...
When I first met you...and even now...@you accept my weaknesses...

group_1.textLeft: You too...@Thank you...

group_1.textRight: ...Of course...

group_1.textLeft: Well then, after all that talk,@let's take a break.

group_1.textRight: *sniffle*...@Alright...
Since you were finding some old nostalgic things@while cleaning, why don't you show me some more?

group_1.textLeft: Well then... First, how about this?

group_1.narration: 'There's some jello, it's in the refrigerator.'

group_1.textRight: Ah, a note from Yacchan's grandma...!?

group_1.textLeft: I found it in a gap in the sofa.

group_1.textRight: Hehe, how nostalgic...!

group_1.textLeft: Next is...

group_1.textRight: Ah, did you also find this while cleaning?

group_1.textLeft: Eh?

group_1.textRight: A long time ago Yacchan was using this letter set,@right?
This letter is...@Did Yacchan write this letter to someone?

group_1.textLeft: ...Don't look at that!

group_1.textRight: Ah...um...@I didn't read any of the contents...?

group_1.textLeft: This...was my major secret back then...!
It's dangerous to just read this!

group_1.textRight: Ehhh!?
What is it...?@A love letter, perhaps...?

group_1.textLeft: [chara:100201:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Huh!?
That is absolutely not it...!

group_1.textRight: Of course... My apologies...

group_1.textLeft: Now that I think about it,@it's kind of amazing...
I thought that I wouldn't be able to leave@anything behind back then...
But since I'm still here,@I can talk about these memories...

group_1.textRight: I feel the same.
Back then I could never imagine it, but...
...I'm just so happy to be alive right now...

group_1.textLeft: ...Yeah...
(If I could live without losing anyone anymore...)
No way, it's been this long already?

group_1.textRight: I wasn't aware of the time at all...

group_1.textLeft: ...Hey, Mifuyu.@I will write this year's letter...

group_1.textRight: By the next time we meet,@I will bring a written letter, too.

group_1.textLeft: Right.
...Next year, and the year after that,@let's exchange letters forever.
It's a promise, Mifuyu.

group_1.textRight: Of course, Yacchan.
